fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, Single market, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Sport
eu_initiatives:
Food Supplements legislation (general)  
European Health Claims Regulation  
Sport Foods legislation  
Additives legislation  
Generic descriptors legislation  
Novel food legislation  
Mutual Recognition (related to food supplements)
organisation_name: GREEK ASSOCIATION OF FOOD SUPPLEMENTS' ENTERPREUNERS (SESDI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: SESDI is a member of the European Federation of Associations of Health Product Manufacturers (EHPM)
goals__remit:
SESDI was created back in 1992, as the Greek Food Supplements Association, representing the majority of Greek companies that are active in the field.  
 
SESDI aims to promote awareness of the role of food supplements in nutrition and well-being and to encourage  self compliance of the sector in Greece.  
 
Our goal is also to encourage the participation of manufacturing and trading companies in the decision and policy making processes ensuring a fair regulatory framework for this category of products.
relevant_communication: SESDI participates frequently in the public relations events and projects through its European counterpart, the European Federation of Associations of Health Product Manufacturers.
